mutants.code:
import math

def calculate_circle(radius, decimal_place=3):
    area = math.pi * radius ** 2
    circumference = 2 * math.pi * radius
    area = round(area, decimal_place)
    circumference = round(circumference, decimal_place)
    return (area, circumference)
